question: Who of the following was not a member of the Towards Equality report?
explanation: Towards Equality was the title of the report of the Committee on the Status of Women in India (1974-75).  Its authors included Vina Mazumdar and Lotika Sarkar, who later founded the Centre for Women’s Development Studies in Delhi. The report proved to be an “eye opener” women’s condition by talking about development and democracy from gender perspective.
